Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants David Morse, the parent of firefighter Peyton Morse, accidental death benefits
Summary: Grants David Morse, the parent of firefighter Peyton Morse, who was employed by the city of Watertown, accidental death benefits.
ActClause: AN ACT granting David Morse, the parent of firefighter Peyton Morse, accidental death benefits
